string.value: #p1013203# starts talking to you. It must be about the Secret Organization's fourth mission. Respond to #p1013203#.

#p1013203# tells you to go get the #b#t4032472##k from #b#p2092001##k in #b#m251000000##k. He says he will explain what it will be used for later... Go to #m251000000# for now.\r\n\r\n#i4032472# #t4032472# #b#c4032472# / 1#k
You gave the map to #p1013203#. #p1013203# asks you to wait as he will give you your next mission...
I didn't think I'd be seeing you so soon. I've actually received intel a bit earlier than expected. So now I have your fourth mission.
The fourth mission is to retrieve the map of an island. Don't worry, it won't be too difficult to find. #b#p2092001##k in #b#m251000000##k has the map, so all you need to do is get it from him.
Just tell #p2092001# that you need the #b#t4032472##k and he'll know what you're talking about. I'll tell you what the map is for after you bring it to me.
Hehe... What luck! I had no idea that I was standing next to #rsomeone with an Onyx Dragon#k. Hmm. No, it's nothing. Just go ahead and complete the mission.
What, you're refusing? Oh no, oh no. Why is everyone being so defiant today?
You've brought the #t4032472#? Show it to me. I want to make sure it is the one that we are looking for.
Haha. Looks like you've got the right one.
You haven't gotten the #b#t4032472##k yet? I thought I made it clear that #p2092001# in #m251000000# has the map.
